#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    char direction[100005];
    long int area,y,i,n;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%s",direction);
        area=0;
        y=0;
        n=strlen(direction);
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            if(direction[i]=='N')
                y++;
            else if(direction[i]=='S')
                y--;
            else if(direction[i]=='E')
                area+=y;
            else
                area-=y;
        }
        if(area<0)
            printf("%ld\n",(-1)*area);
        else
            printf("%ld\n",area);
    }
    return 0;
}
